Uses of Class
jsx.motion.Regular

Packages that use Regular
jsx.motion Provides clear-in-mind practicable methodologies for definition and utilization to step-motion models that are useful in designing animation, visual effects and vector graphics. 
jsx.motion.reg Provides regular motion functions and their operations. 
jsx.motion.reg.cmp Provides composite regular motion operations. 
jsx.motion.reg.cmp.bin Provides binary composite regular motion operations. 
 

Uses of Regular in jsx.motion
 

Methods in jsx.motion with parameters of type Regular
protected static double Regular.call(Regular r, double x)
          Computes and returns the value, depending on a specified variable, of a specified regular function.
 

Uses of Regular in jsx.motion.reg
 

Subclasses of Regular in jsx.motion.reg
 class Composite
          An abstract class to define a composite regular function.
 class Constant
          Defines constant regular functions whose value is always 0.
 class Cubic
          Defines cubic regular functions.
 class Quad
          Defines quadratic regular functions.
 class Quart
          Defines quartic regular functions.
 class Quint
          Defines quintic regular functions.
 class Uniform
          Defines constant regular functions whose value is always same as the value of its independent variable.
 

Constructors in jsx.motion.reg with parameters of type Regular
Composite(Regular composite)
          Constructs a regular function of this type with the composite regular function predefined for an argument.
 

Uses of Regular in jsx.motion.reg.cmp
 

Subclasses of Regular in jsx.motion.reg.cmp
 class Binary
          An abstract class to define a composite regular function with two existing ones.
 class Mirror
          Defines a mirror function of the specified existing regular function.
 class Zoom
          Defines a composite regular function with an existing regular function scaled.
 

Constructors in jsx.motion.reg.cmp with parameters of type Regular
Binary(Regular r1, Regular r2)
          A typical constructor to construct a composite regular function of this type.
Mirror(Regular m)
          Constructs a composite regular function by mirroring the domain and value range of the argument regular function.
Zoom(Regular r, double scale)
          A typical constructor to construct a composite regular function of this type.
 

Uses of Regular in jsx.motion.reg.cmp.bin
 

Subclasses of Regular in jsx.motion.reg.cmp.bin
 class Both
          Defines a composite regular function with an existing regular function in charge of both the 1st and the 2nd halves of the domain.
 class Joint
          Defines a composite regular function by joining two existing regular functions with the 1st one in charge of the 1st half of the domain and the 2nd one, the 2nd half.
 

Constructors in jsx.motion.reg.cmp.bin with parameters of type Regular
Both(Regular r)
          A typical constructor to construct a composite regular function of this type.
Joint(Regular r1, Regular r2)
          A typical constructor to construct a composite regular function of this type.
